org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.engine
[Java] Class SimpleDBEntityPersister

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.engine.NativeEntryEntityPersister
      org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.engine.SimpleDBEntityPersister

public class SimpleDBEntityPersister
extends NativeEntryEntityPersister

A org.grails.datastore.mapping.engine.EntityPersister implementation for the SimpleDB store.

Authors:
Roman Stepanenko based on Graeme Rocher code for MongoDb and Redis
Since:
0.1

Nested Class Summary
protected class SimpleDBEntityPersister.SimpleDBNativeEntryModifyingEntityAccess

Provides proper conversion of 'version' field from Integer to Long - since we use numeric padding in SimpleDB there are different amounts of zeros for Long and Integer - and it matters for optimistic locking assertions on SimpleDB level.
